tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_rotation_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  planting_date DATE,
  crop_compatibility VARCHAR(255),
  pest_management_strategy TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RotationPlan (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT REFERENCES CropCompatibility(crop_id),
    pest_id INT REFERENCES PestManagement(pest_id),
    rotation_year INT,
    notes TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE crop_rotation_plans (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name VARCHAR(255), crop_compatibility VARCHAR(255), pest_management_strategy VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE crops (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name VARCHAR(255), crop_type VARCHAR(255), harvest_season VARCHAR(255), planting_season VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE compatible_crops (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, compatible_crop_id INT, compatibility_score INT)
CREATE TABLE pests (pest_id INT PRIMARY KEY, pest_name VARCHAR(255), pest_type VARCHAR(255), damage_intensity INT)
CREATE TABLE pest_management_strategies (strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, strategy_name VARCHAR(255), strategy_description TEXT)
